八白: (はっぱく) - eighth of nine traditional astrological signs (corresponding to Saturn and north-east)
八百万の神: (やおよろずのかみ) - {Shinto}  all the gods and goddesses; all the deities
八百八寺: (はっぴゃくやでら) - (yoji) the large number of temples in Kyoto
八百八橋: (はっぴゃくやばし) - (yoji) the large number of bridges over canals and rivers in Naniwa (present-day Osaka)
八百八町: (はっぴゃくやちょう) - (yoji) the whole enormous extent of Edo; from one side of Edo to the other
八百屋防風: (やおやぼうふう) - Glehnia littoralis (species of umbellifer used in Chinese medicine)
八百長: (やおちょう) - match fixing; put-up job; fixed game
八目: (やつめ) - eighth (place, position, etc.); having eight eyes/having many eyes; (of a fabric) having a loose knit; lamprey; eight-holed arrow whistle
八目鏑: (やつめかぶら) - eight-holed arrow whistle
八目鰻: (ヤツメウナギ) - lamprey; lamprey eel
八省: (はっしょう) - the eight ministries (under the Grand Council of State of the ritsuryo system)
八紘: (はっこう) - the eight directions; the whole land; the whole world
八紘一宇: (はっこういちう) - (yoji) (WWII political slogan often seen as implying Japanese world domination) universal brotherhood; all eight corners of the world under one roof
八聖道: (はっしょうどう) - noble eightfold path
八股: (はっこ) - eight-legged essay (classical Chinese style of essay writing)
八股文: (はっこぶん) - eight-legged essay (classical Chinese style of essay writing)
八脚の案: (やつあしのつくえ) - eight-legged table (used as a stand for religious offerings, etc.)
八脚門: (はっきゃくもん) - single-tiered gate with eight secondary pillars supporting the four main central pillars
八艘飛び: (やそうとび) - {sumo} leap up from the initial charge in order to surprise the opponent
八色の姓: (はっしきのかばね) - eight hereditary titles (designated by Emperor Tenmu in 684 CE: Mahito, Asomi, Sukune, Imiki, Michinoshi, Omi, Muraji, Inagi)
八色姓: (はっしきのかばね) - eight hereditary titles (designated by Emperor Tenmu in 684 CE: Mahito, Asomi, Sukune, Imiki, Michinoshi, Omi, Muraji, Inagi)
八色鳥: (ヤイロチョウ) - fairy pitta (Pitta nympha)
八苦: (はっく) - the eight kinds of suffering (birth, old age, disease, death, parting from loved ones, meeting disliked ones, not getting what one seeks, pains of the five skandha)
八虐: (はちぎゃく) - the eight unpardonable crimes in ancient Japanese law
八角: (はっかく) - octagon; star anise (Illicium verum); sailfin poacher (Podothecus sachi)
八角形: (はっかっけい) - eight-sided shape; octagon
八角茴香: (ハッカクウイキョウ) - star anise (Illicium verum)
八角鷹: (ハチクマ) - crested honey buzzard (Pernis ptilorhynchus); Oriental honey buzzard; pern
八識: (はちしき) - eight consciousnesses (one for each of the five senses, consciousness of the mind, self-consciousness and store consciousness)
八足の机: (はっそくのつくえ) - eight-legged table (used as a stand for religious offerings, etc.)
八足門: (やつあしもん) - single-tiered gate with eight secondary pillars supporting the four main central pillars
八逆: (はちぎゃく) - the eight unpardonable crimes in ancient Japanese law
八進細分記号: (はちしんさいぶんきごう) - octave device
八道: (はちどう) - the 8 districts of feudal Japan
八達: (はったつ) - (roads) running in all directions; convenient transportation; ability in any line
八部: (はちぶ) - the eight legions (devas, nagas, yaksas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kimnaras, mahoragas)
八部衆: (はちぶしゅう) - the eight legions (devas, nagas, yaksas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kimnaras, mahoragas)
八重山斑蜚蠊: (ヤエヤママダラゴキブリ) - Rhabdoblatta yayeyamana (species of cockroach)
八重山椰子: (ヤエヤマヤシ) - Satake palm (Satakentia liukiuensis); Yaeyama palm
八重山蛭木: (ヤエヤマヒルギ) - Rhizophora mucronata (species of mangrove)
八重旗雲: (やえはたぐも) - banner clouds in layers
八重桜: (やえざくら) - double-flowered cherry tree; double cherry blossoms
八重梔子: (ヤエクチナシ) - eightfold gardenia; Gardenia jasminoide
八重歯: (やえば) - double tooth; protruding tooth (like a fang); high canine
八重葎: (ヤエムグラ) - thick patch of mixed weeds; false cleavers (species of bedstraw, Galium spurium var. echinospermon)
八間: (はちけん) - large hanging paper lantern
八雲: (やくも) - thick clouds; classical Japanese poetry
八面: (はちめん) - eight faces; all sides
八面六臂: (はちめんろっぴ) - (yoji) competent in all fields; jack of all trades; very active in many fields; versatile; all-round; 8 faces and 6 arms
八面玲瓏: (はちめんれいろう) - (yoji) beautiful from all sides; perfect serenity; affability
八頭: (はちがしら) - kanji "eight" radical at top
八頭身: (はっとうしん) - beautiful well-proportioned woman (body 8 times longer than head)
公: (kou/ooyake) - public , official, governmental, formal; public (use, facility, etc.), common; public (matter, place, etc.), (out in the) open
公々然: (こうこうぜん) - very much out in the open (as in a information)
公にする: (おおやけにする) - to make public
公の施設: (おおやけのしせつ) - public facility
公会堂: (こうかいどう) - town hall; public hall
公住: (こうじゅう) - apartment house built by the Japan Housing Corporation
公使: (こうし) - envoy; diplomat below the rank of ambassador (e.g. deputy chief of mission, charge d'affaires); minister (of legation)
公侯: (こうこう) - princes and marquises; great feudal lords
公債: (こうさい) - public debt; public bond or securities
公傷制度: (こうしょうせいど) - {sports} official injury exemption system; system for exempting players injured in an official match from pay reduction or demotion
